name: Insurance Certification Definition
description:
This data type specifies whether insurance certification is required for particular patient types, and the time window for obtaining the certification. 

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.8.20 IN3-20, as of v2.5.

fields.name: Certification Patient Type
fields.description: Specifies the category or type of patient for which this certification is requested. Refer to User-defined Table 0150 - Certification patient type for suggested values.

fields.name: Certification Required
fields.dataTypeName: Coded Value For Hl7 Defined Tables
fields.description: Specifies whether or not a certification is required. Refer to HL7 Table 0136 - Yes/no Indicator for valid values.

fields.name: Date/Time Certification Required
fields.description: The date/time by which the certification must be obtained.
